title: Calories in Rice Krispies
meta_description: Discover calories in rice krispies per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for your bowl.
assumptions: Kellogg's Rice Krispies cereal, dry and unprepared; standard 1-cup serving size (~30 g).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, serving size, and added ingredients like milk or sugar. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 30 g serving of Rice Krispies provides ~120 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1/2 cup skim milk per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of Rice Krispies?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal per 30 g (1 cup) dry serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Rice Krispies?
faqs.a: 27 g total carbs per 30 g serving, with 3 g sugars and 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does Rice Krispies have protein or fat?
faqs.a: 2 g protein and just 0.2 g fat per 30 g serving.

faqs.q: How much sodium in Rice Krispies?
faqs.a: 190 mg per 30 g serving; opt for low-sodium if watching intake.

faqs.q: Calories in Rice Krispies with milk?
faqs.a: Adds ~40-80 kcal depending on milk type; total ~160-200 kcal for skim milk.
